sentences: Naisel oli kalduvus end vaimselt piinata ja selle kannatusi nautida.
MÃµned inimesed nautivad iseendale tekitatud valu.
context: The word 'nautida' in Estonian means 'to enjoy' or 'to take pleasure in'. It can refer to enjoying various experiences, pleasures, or even pain and suffering depending on context. In the example sentences provided, it shows usage both for enjoying pleasure (pain inflicted by a partner) and more general enjoyment of experiences.
